ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of J. PAULINE RAFFERTY, O.B.C., of Victoria, British Columbia, to be Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum for Human Rights, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
